title: Oppressor Oni
desc:
*Bow before my might!*

A burly monster who will respond directly to the might of your own attacks. If your weapon rolls its highest possible damage for any reason, this monster will immediately gain +5 Strength for 3 turns, and cause you to Bleed for 3 turns, which prevents you from healing.

Whatever you do, don't bring the Lucky effect into this fight, if you can avoid it. Having Bleeding stacked on your for an extended period of time can almost certainly spell your doom. Alternatively, it can't counter your max rolls if it simply dies first.
